text: Lucas Gourna-Douath (born 5 August 2003) is a French professional footballer. He plays as midfielder for Austrian Bundesliga club Red Bull Salzburg. ==Club career== ===Saint-Étienne=== Gourna-Douath started in local clubs near his birthplace. In 2018 he went to Saint-Étienne. On 6 May 2020 he signed his first professional contract with the club at the age of 16. He made his debut in a 2–0 Ligue 1 win over Strasbourg on 12 September 2020. ===Red Bull Salzburg=== On 13 July 2022 he signed Austrian club Red Bull Salzburg. The transfer fee paid to Saint-Étienne was €15 million. He ist the most expensive signing in the history of Austrian football. ==International career== Gourna- Douath was born in France and is of Central African Republic origin. He is a youth international for France and captain of the U19 team. ==Other websites== * * * ASSE Profile ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Austrian football champions Category:Sportspeople from Val-de-Marne
title: Lucas Gourna-Douath
